verses.name: Revelation 12:14
verses.text: And to the woman were given two wings of a great eagle, that she might fly into the wilderness, into her place, where she is nourished for a time, and times, and half a time, from the face of the serpent.

verses.name: Revelation 12:15
verses.text: And the serpent cast out of his mouth water as a flood after the woman, that he might cause her to be carried away of the flood.

verses.name: Revelation 12:16
verses.text: And the earth helped the woman, and the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed up the flood which the dragon cast out of his mouth.
